plot: A gang of poverty-ridden juvenile delinquents progress from petty theft to hard crime, but a kindly judge manages to set most of them on the right path after they are finally apprehended.
title: Dans les rues
plot_es: A gang of poverty-ridden juvenile delinquents progress from petty theft to hard crime, but a kindly judge manages to set most of them on the right path after they are finally apprehended.
plot_en: A gang of poverty-ridden juvenile delinquents progress from petty theft to hard crime, but a kindly judge manages to set most of them on the right path after they are finally apprehended.

cast.role: Rosalie - la fille du père Schlamp
cast.name: Madeleine Ozeray

cast.role: Moustique - le fils de la concierge
cast.name: Le Petit Patachou
